::DrillBit::

DrillBit got out of the tank. His damage hadn't been that bad.
He walked in to the main chamber, and saw KitKat in front of Megatron.
Not again, he thought. He hated seeing her do this. He hated seeing his
beloved bow to the tyrent. He hated seeing the fear of his beatings in
her.
